archimate:Requirement.name: Repository covers sales & customer team questions
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
This requirement came from Hemant Chavant and was approved by SCARB 2023-01-13. Rationale needs to be added.
We will need to source the questions: - Find out who typically answer these questions (at least Mikael Lingskog and Jan Drasal) - Interview those doing the answering: most common questions & answers - Interview sales /customer teams on the questions/areas they most often need answers to - Write the answers (requires finding out the content either from those typically answering or e.g. official company policies) -Organize quality review
